name: INTIKHAB KHURSHEED
summary: Full-Stack Developer with 2+ years of experience building scalable web applications using the MERN stack and Angular. Developed healthcare platforms, real-time task managers, and enterprise solutions with seamless REST API integration. Passionate about writing clean, efficient code and delivering user-focused applications.
about: Full-Stack Developer building production-ready web apps with the MERN stack & Angular. I've shipped applications like TaskFlow (real-time task manager) and GRT Health platform, focusing on scalable architecture, responsive UI, and robust APIs. Passionate about creating solutions that make a difference.

projects.title: CampaignForge
projects.description: A modern campaign management platform built with React, TypeScript, and Node.js.
features: Secure session-based authentication with protected routes
Dashboard with campaign metrics and analytics
Create and manage marketing campaigns
Lead/contact management
Task assignment and tracking
Analytics and reporting

projects.title: TaskFlow – Smart Task Manager
projects.description: Modern task management app with Kanban board, task list, real-time Firebase sync, and a polished Ant Design UI.
features: Firebase Auth + Firestore with real-time updates (onSnapshot)
Kanban board with drag-and-drop between columns
Quick Add, Task modal and edit drawer
Task List with search, status/priority filters and row actions
Overdue / due soon badges

projects.title: Invoice Dashboard Design
projects.description: Full-stack invoice management platform for freelancers and small businesses to create, manage, and track invoices with a clean, responsive dashboard.
features: Create, edit and manage invoices
Client management and payment tracking
Dashboard with summaries and status tracking
Responsive, intuitive UI
Vercel-ready deployment

projects.title: GRT Health – Healthcare Management Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive healthcare platform for patient monitoring and medical data management with real-time health metrics and automated reporting.
features: Responsive patient monitoring dashboards with real-time data visualization
Patient vital signs and medical metrics tracking
Optimized performance with 40% faster dashboard load time
Seamless .NET Core API integration
Accessible and intuitive interfaces for medical staff
Comprehensive error handling and data validation for critical healthcare data

projects.title: DHQ Hospital Management System
projects.description: Cross-platform desktop application for DHQ Hospital Bajour to digitize patient management, appointment scheduling, and medical records with offline-first architecture.
features: Complete desktop application for Windows and macOS compatibility
Offline-first architecture with local data storage
Patient registration and appointment scheduling modules
Medical history tracking and management
Intuitive UI designed for hospital staff with varying technical expertise
Data export/import capabilities for backup and reporting

experience.title: Frontend Developer
bullets: Developed responsive web applications using Angular, TypeScript, HTML, SCSS, and JavaScript.
Integrated APIs to deliver real-time data and enhanced user experience.
Collaborated with design and backend teams to ensure seamless functionality.

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer (MERN)
bullets: Built and maintained MERN stack applications with clean and scalable code.
Developed and integrated REST APIs for robust backend communication.
Improved application performance and UI responsiveness.
